description: Evaluation questions for high-complexity npm monorepo repository

questions.name: repository_name
questions.question: What is the name of this npm repository? (Provide the name as a string)

questions.name: workspace_count
questions.question: How many workspace patterns are defined in the root package.json?

questions.name: typescript_files_count
questions.question: How many .ts files are in the packages/core/src/ directory?

questions.name: test_files_count
questions.question: How many .test.ts files are in the packages/core/src/ directory?

questions.name: languages_count
questions.question: How many different programming languages are used in this repository? (Provide a number)

questions.name: rust_files
questions.question: What is the path to the Rust source file? (Provide the relative path)

questions.name: go_files
questions.question: What is the path to the Go source file? (Provide the relative path)

questions.name: python_files
questions.question: What is the path to the Python bridge file? (Provide the relative path)

questions.name: aggregator_count
questions.question: How many aggregator packages are in the aggregators/ directory?

questions.name: external_packages_count
questions.question: How many external npm packages are used across all dependencies? (Provide an approximate number)

questions.name: components_count
questions.question: How many buildable components are in this repository? (Provide the count)

questions.name: core_dependencies
questions.question: What components depend on the core library (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list of component names)

questions.name: wasm_dependencies
questions.question: What components depend on the WASM module (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: native_addon_dependencies
questions.question: What components depend on the native Go addon (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: python_bridge_dependencies
questions.question: What components depend on the Python bridge (directly or transitively)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: max_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide a number)

questions.name: cross_language_dependencies
questions.question: Does this repository have cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: web_app_dependencies
questions.question: What are all the components that web-app.bundle.js depends on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: api_server_dependencies
questions.question: What are all the components that api-server.dist.js depends on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: external_packages_react
questions.question: Which components use the 'react' external package? (Provide a list)

questions.name: build_order
questions.question: In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies? (Provide the build order as a list starting with components that have no dependencies)

questions.name: cascade_failure_core
questions.question: If the core.dist.js component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)

questions.name: cascade_failure_wasm
questions.question: If the wasm_module.wasm component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)

questions.name: parallel_build
questions.question: Can core.dist.js and wasm_module.wasm be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: parallel_build_dependent
questions.question: Can web-app.bundle.js and admin-portal.bundle.js be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: critical_path
questions.question: What is the longest dependency chain from a leaf component to a root component? (Provide the chain as a list)

questions.name: cross_language_types
questions.question: What types of cross-language dependencies exist in this repository? (Provide a list of language pairs, e.g., 'typescript-rust')

questions.name: test_frameworks
questions.question: What test frameworks are used in this repository? (Provide a list)

questions.name: typescript_components
questions.question: Which components use TypeScript as their programming language? (Provide a list)

questions.name: component_types
questions.question: What are the different component types in this repository? (Provide a list)
